subject: Dear Beneficiary Compliment
body:
Dear Beneficiary Compliment of the season,
 How are you today, just call me to write  you  this  email and to notify you of my coming to your house any moment from now.  I know it might come to you as a surprise because we did not send you a primary notice, yes I am supposed to do that but I want to take you by surprise.
 Right now as I am writing to you this email  I am in the city of Leeds at the house of Mr Andrew Coding, with the mobile number +447031829803, who hosted-ed me for three days now because of the delivery I made  to him . I know you might be scammed because of that name delivery from many people who claim to be what they are not or you might not but I am here to tell you that it is over . Your time has come. God has remembered you .
 You name was chosen as one of the favorite for this mighty package by the united Nation  because of your generosity and help to mankind's which make  the whole assemblymen to honor you and decide to package this items for  you which i am here today to deliver to you
  Please my dear, I would like you to do one thing that will bring success to this package . Send to me the following information below:
Your Full Name........................ .......
Your contact address....................... ......
Your  cellphone number........................ ..
Your pass copy.......................... ............
The nearest airport to your house.............
Your delivery address....................... ..........
Sex.......................... ...........................
Your Country....................... .............
Your Occupation....................
With this i can locate you without delay, one more thing do  all the papers and documents that are due for this delivery is here with me all you need to do is forwards information a requested from you now so that immediately i leave this house of  Mr Andrew , i will proceed to meet you at your  airport you recommend to me
Thanks and God bless you, meet you soon 
Thanks
Diplomat Frank Joe 
(Specialized Delivery Division)
Diplomatic/Delivery Officer

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary Compliment
body:
Dear Diplomat Frank Joe,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this email finds you well. I must admit, your message has piqued my curiosity. It's quite unexpected to receive such news, but I'm open to hearing more about it.

Before I provide any personal information or take any further steps, could you please clarify a few things for me? Firstly, what exactly is this package that the United Nations has chosen for me? Secondly, how did they come to know about my generosity and help to mankind? Lastly, can you explain why it is necessary for me to provide my full name, contact details, passport information, and the nearest airport?

I appreciate your understanding and look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Leroy
